Quick Google Search Extension

Ever come across a piece of text on a website and wish you could quickly search it on Google without the hassle of copy-pasting? Our Quick Google Search Extension is here to revolutionize your browsing experience!

Features:

Instant Search: Just select any text on a webpage, and a "Search Google" button appears right next to your selection. One click, and you're searching Google with the selected text!
Minimalistic Design: Our button is designed to be non-intrusive, ensuring that it doesn't disrupt your reading or browsing experience.
Seamless Integration: Works across various websites without interfering with their designs or styles.
Safe and Private: We respect your privacy. The extension doesn't store or transmit any of your data.
Enhance your browsing experience and save time with our Quick Google Search Extension. A world of information is just one click away!
